conventions.commit_note: All commits must start with fix:, feat:, or docs:
conventions.phase_commit_format: feat: NN description (one commit per phase, no parentheses, phase number after colon)
conventions.phase_commit_example: feat: 01 add Total Time stat and hide search menu

CRITICAL_RULES.ONE_COMMIT_PER_PHASE: NEVER make multiple commits. Squash ALL work (research, planning, context, execution, fixes, docs) into ONE SINGLE commit at the END. Format: 'feat: NN description' or 'feat: quick-NNN description'. NO intermediate commits. NO docs commits. ONE COMMIT ONLY.
